options.content: INTEND 5G4Data Datacenter Dashboard

targets.queryText:
PREFIX dct:   <http://purl.org/dc/terms/>
PREFIX geo:   <http://www.opengis.net/ont/geosparql#>
PREFIX icm:   <http://tio.models.tmforum.org/tio/v3.6.0/IntentCommonModel/>
PREFIX log:   <http://tio.models.tmforum.org/tio/v3.6.0/LogicalOperators/>
PREFIX data5g: <http://5g4data.eu/5g4data#>

SELECT (CONCAT(
  "{",
  "\n\t\"type\" : \"FeatureCollection\",",
  "\n\t\"name\" : \"Slices\",",
  "\n\t\"crs\" : {",
  "\n\t\t\"type\" : \"name\",",
  "\n\t\t\"properties\" : {",
  "\n\t\t\t\"name\" : \"EPSG:4326\"",
  "\n\t\t}",
  "\n\t},",
  "\n\t\"features\" : [",
  "\n", GROUP_CONCAT(?geojson; separator=",\n"),
  "\n\t]",
  "\n}",
  ""
) AS ?featureCollection)
WHERE {
  # Subselect builds each Feature JSON (same logic you had),
  # then the outer SELECT concatenates them into one FeatureCollection.
  SELECT ?intentId ?geojson
  WHERE {
    # OPTIONAL: wrap in your named graph
    # GRAPH <http://5g4data.eu/intents> {

      ?intent a icm:Intent .
      OPTIONAL { ?intent dct:description ?description }

      ?intent (log:allOf)+ ?el .
      ?el data5g:appliesToRegion ?region .
      ?region a geo:Feature ;
              geo:hasGeometry/geo:asWKT ?wkt .

      BIND(
        IF(CONTAINS(STR(?intent), "#"),
           STRAFTER(STR(?intent), "#"),
           REPLACE(STR(?intent), "^.*/", "")
        ) AS ?intentId
      )

      # Extract "x y, x y, ..." from POLYGON(( x y, ... ))
      BIND(REPLACE(STR(?wkt), "^POLYGON\\(\\((.*)\\)\\)$", "$1") AS ?pairs)

      # Convert "x y" -> "[x,y]"  (use $1/$2 backrefs)
      BIND(REPLACE(?pairs, "([0-9\\-\\.]+)\\s+([0-9\\-\\.]+)", "[$1,$2]") AS ?coords)

      # Build a Feature object string
      BIND(CONCAT(
        "{",
          "\"type\":\"Feature\",",
          "\"geometry\":{\"type\":\"Polygon\",\"coordinates\":[[", ?coords, "]]},",
          "\"properties\":{",
            "\"intent_id\":\"", ?intentId, "\",",
            "\"description\":", IF(BOUND(?description), CONCAT("\"", ?description, "\""), "null"),
          "}",
        "}"
      ) AS ?geojson)

    # }
  }
  LIMIT 200
}

list.label: Datacenter 1
list.name: datacenter1

list.label: Datacenter 2
list.name: datacenter2
